title: Hotdogs & Ideas: The Secret Connection to Quality
description:
Discover the surprising connection between hotdogs and ideas in this eye-opening video. We'll dive into the concept of the "supply chain of ideas" and how low-quality supply chains can lead to low-quality ideas, just like in the world of hotdogs. 

Join us as we explore creativity and supply chains, and the quality of ideas we generate!



Check out our new tech moves with: https://internetfactory.substack.com/

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!
